answers.answer: If you  have lost this much weight without trying to you need to see a doctor.  And urgently.  YOu need to be tested for diabetes as well as other things.  If you are diabetic and this is what is causing you to lose weight it is very serious.  YOu would need medications /possibly insulin to treat it.  Once  properly treated you will stop losing weight.If you are in the US you can buy an over the counter A1C test.  If this test is high it would also indicate diabetes.However, please see your doctor urgently.  YOur condition must not be ignored.Please let us know how you go.
